## Date Formatting

Write your dates as: 

> `YYYY-MM-DD`

*e.g.*, `Sys.Date()`

`YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS` for date + time

. . . 

Default in analytics-world: 

- Unambiguous (`DD-MM` vs `MM-DD`)
- *Alphabetical*: sort by name => sort by date!
